settings.title: THE FIÈRA DIFFERENCE
settings.sub_title: Skincare that actually works for mature skin, because it was designed for mature skin.
settings.content:
Many “mass market” beauty brands put revenue before results. They promote a generic “one-formula-fits-all-ages'' cosmetics line that unfortunately over promises and under delivers.

That’s because mature skin requires a different formula than a 20-something. A cream that absorbs quickly on smooth youthful skin, might feel thick, greasy, and sit atop textured skin. Not all creams are created equal, no matter how big the brand is.

Fièra’s Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream works because it was designed for and tested on women over 40.

Mature skin doesn’t have to look “mature” anymore.

settings.title: How Fièra Apple <br class="forMob">Stem Cell Cream Works
settings.sub_title: Fièra Apple Stem Cell Cream combines rare apple stem cells that have been shown to help lengthen and regenerate the skin cells with Sea Buckthorn Oil and other naturally powerful ingredients to restore your skin's natural firmness, glow, and youthful appearance.
settings.content_1: Regenerative ingredients that help even out skin-tone and make the skin appear brighter and more youthful.
settings.content_2: Hydrative ingredients like hemp oil that help tighten up the skin and offer a much smoother complexion.
settings.title_3: Delays the skin cells from aging
settings.content_3: Fièra Apple Stem Cell Cream combines rare apple stem cells that have been shown to help lengthen and regenerate the skin cells.
settings.content_4: Makes fine lines, wrinkles and other signs of aging a thing of the past, instead of the future.

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: Sea Buckthorn Oil
settings.content: Promotes skin cell regeneration, hydration and elasticity, while anti-inflammatory properties help to reduce redness and swelling associated with various skin conditions.

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.content: A potent antioxidant, among the best for protecting against free radicals and sun damage.

settings.title: Vitamin A
settings.content: Improves skin tone, minimizes fine lines and wrinkles and gives the skin a radiant glow.

settings.title: Apple Stem Cells
settings.content: Stem cells derived from a rare apple tree that has longevity and regenerative properties to revitalize the skin’s youthful appearance and delay the signs of aging.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: Fièra Apple Stem Cell Cream utilizes the regenerative properties of stem cells to not only improve the skin’s youthful appearance, but to delay the aging process, keeping your skin looking young and fresh.
settings.popup_content: Purified Water, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Stearic Acid, Malus Domestica, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hyaluronic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Oil, Sea Buckthorn Oil, Polisorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Retinol Palmitate (Vitamin A),

settings.title: Wash & Prep
settings.content: For best results and maximum moisture retention, apply to a washed and clean area morning and night. This allows the neck cream to be absorbed even faster. If using a serum, like our antioxidant Citrus Stem Cell Serum, apply that first and allow one minute for it to absorb.

settings.title: Gently Apply
settings.content: Gently apply a pearl-sized amount onto the neck and décolleté in a circular motion. This is a premium product so while it’s not thick or greasy, a little does go a long way.

settings.title: Put On Concealer
settings.content: This neck cream absorbs and dries quickly. So if you’re using a concealer, like our highly-pigmented Luxury Concealer to cover dark spots or wrinkles on your neck, apply that a minute or two after the cream has absorbed (and after SPF if using that as well!). With newly hydrated, smooth, plump skin now underneath, your concealer goes on flawlessly and your neck looks youthful again.

settings.title: Enjoy Ageless Beauty
settings.content: Go about your day knowing you’re both correcting the signs of aging and protecting against further damage at the same time. Enjoy ageless beauty and all the “you look so good!” compliments.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.
